name: Flipper Hazard 5
description:
Flipper Hazard 5 is a sequel to Flipper Hazard 4 which brings completely new stages and levels into play!

Control 2 or even 4 pads to pass the levels and achieve their goals. Raise your score by hitting the score raising objects on your way. Watch over your pinballs so you don't run out of them.

As you progress - the stages get harder. You can always replay any stage in order to improve the score you achieved.

Pin the balls to the hazard level and clear another batch of challenging stages!
